Allen n 1: United States comedienne remembered as the confused but imperturbable partner of her husband, George Burns (1906-1964) [syn: {Gracie Allen}, {Grace Ethel Cecile Rosalie Allen}, {Gracie}] 2: United States filmmaker and comic actor (1935-) [syn: {Woody Allen}, {Allen Stewart Konigsberg}] 3: a soldier of the American Revolution whose troops helped capture Fort Ticonderoga from the British (1738-1789) [syn: {Ethan Allen}]
